sentence.Network_en: Suriname has the largest protected area of forest in the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏利南拥有全世界最大的热带雨林保护区.

sentence.Network_en: They are from Suriname , in the Amazon Basin tropic tropical forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们来自在亚马逊热带雨林的苏里南.

sentence.Network_en: The red sandalwood tree has been planted in Suriname as an ornamental.
sentence.Network_cn: 相思豆被种植在苏利南莫河作为装饰用的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 苏里南-Suriname苏里南国家 {苏里南经济概况} 国民生产总值(GNP) 5.79亿美元,人均国民收入1047美元;货币名称,苏盾。资源矿产主要有铝土,1993年探明蕴藏量为5.42.
